name: nodal
content:
nodal adjective
(JOIN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology consisting of or relating to a place where a leaf and stem join a plant: You can take conventional nodal cuttings, which should be up to 6 inches long.
mathematics, computing consisting of or relating to a place where things such as lines or systems join: a nodal point the nodal structure of an XML document

nodal adjective
(IN BODY)
medical relating to or affecting a lymph node: Cancer cells may spread to lymph nodes near the primarytumour. This is called nodal involvement. nodal lymphoma
